title: Game freezes/skips on first death
body: Does anybody have frame freezes for their first death in a game? My computer is fine, my frames don't drop but my game freezes/skips for like a second every first death for the game. If I am about to take a massive amount of damage my game freezes for a second or two. Any replies help.{{champion:34}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:48}}

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times, and this typically happens if there are missing/corrupt assets that League has to load within that first game each time before it caches those assets to memory. I strongly recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League can properly access certain files and function properly.

Let me know if you encounter issues with this after taking those steps.
Assuming you're on Windows 10, have you tried this? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
